title: The Australian story: overlanders of tomorrow
creator_credit: Doc K Sternberg and C G Scrimgeour
brief_description: The airlift of stud cattle to Brunette Downs Station in the Northern Territory for a stud stock sale is shown followed by the festivities held after the sale.
